headline: Blackstone (BX) is Benefitting from Global Full-Service Deal Sourcing at Scale
summary: Montaka Global Investments, an investment management company, released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The firm is focused on sustainably compounding its portfolio over the long term. The June quarter was interesting for investors. In the first week, Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’ tariff policy caused a double-digit drop […]

headline: Big Tech's AI ambitions are straining the US power grid. Natural gas might be its answer.
summary: Natural gas looks set for a demand boom as AI developers turn to off-grid power to avoid long delays.
